programme.desc: The all-powerful Calabrian crime syndicate 'Ndrangheta has forged a deadly network of drug trafficking routes through Brazil – 80% of all cocaine arriving in Europe comes through the country's Santos port.

programme.title: Behind the scenes on Birmingham derby day with football fans and police
programme.desc: Police on the streets separating rival supporters, cordons restricting access around the ground, holding the away end back after full time: these are familiar experiences for football fans attending derbies up and down the country.

programme.title: Lupita
programme.desc: In a country where indigenous people are increasingly displaced and journalists are killed at an alarming rate, a courageous new voice has emerged.

programme.title: The only way out is through Jesus: The El Salvador pastors saving MS-13 gang members
programme.desc: In El Salvador, where brutal gangs like MS-13 and 18th Street have given the country the world’s highest murder rate, the only way out for members is to become born-again Christians.

programme.title: Life in the shadow of Guatemala's Volcano of Fire
programme.desc: On 3 June, the Fuego volcano in Guatemala erupted, killing at least 113 people and leaving 332 missing. Thousands of victims have been displaced and are still living in temporary shelters.

programme.title: The County - what happens after police kill someone you love?
programme.desc: When someone dies after an encounter with law enforcement, he leaves behind parents and children, loss and confusion. What’s to be done when those people sworn to protect you are the same people who pull the trigger?

programme.title: RIP SENI: racism, graffiti and the UK's mental health crisis
programme.desc: One morning in June 2020, graffiti reading RIP SENI appeared emblazoned across a public artwork outside the Bethlem royal hospital, a psychiatric hospital in south London.

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Black Sheep tells the story of Cornelius Walker, whose life changed on 27 November 2000 - the day Damilola Taylor was killed. Damilola was 10, the same age as Cornelius.

programme.title: My life in a hotel room: Ireland’s hidden homeless crisis
programme.desc: Nuala and her teenage daughter, Laura, were suddenly evicted from their Dublin home when their landlord of 10 years was forced to sell by his creditors.

programme.title: Globalised slavery: how big supermarkets are selling prawns in supply chain fed by slave labour
programme.desc: A six-month Guardian multimedia investigation has, for the first time, tracked how some of the world's big-supermakets are using suppliers relying on slave labour to put cheap prawns on their shelves. Slavery is back and here's the proof. Narrated by Benedict Cumberbatch.

programme.title: The Barcelona design studio for people with Down's syndrome and autism | Bright Lights
programme.desc: The Barcelona design studio for people with Down's syndrome and autism | Bright Lights

programme.title: Dear Bradford: a love letter to a misunderstood city
programme.desc: From Muslim ‘no-go areas’ to Brexit-voting white nationalists, stereotypes continue to be perpetuated about Bradford 21 years after the 'race riots'.

programme.title: Refusing to fight: Israelis against the war in Gaza
programme.desc: For many Israelis, military service is a rite of passage that lasts two to three years. Being such a formative part of the social contract in Israel, it is unusual for eligible young people to refuse their draft orders.

programme.title: Erica: Man made
programme.desc: Erica is 23. She has a beautiful, neutral face and speaks with a synthesised voice. She has a degree of autonomy – but can’t move her hands yet. Hiroshi Ishiguro is her ‘father’ and the bad boy of Japanese robotics.

programme.title: Quipu: Calls for Justice
programme.desc: Esperanza and Teodula are calling for justice in rural Peru, part of 300,000 people sterilised without consent more than 18 years ago. The Quipu Project is their phoneline that allows victims across the country to share their shocking testimonies and ensure those responsible are punished.

programme.title: Skip Day - High school friendship and everyday racism in Florida
programme.desc: Intimate glimpses of one very special day in the lives of high-school seniors from an industrial corner of the Florida Everglades.

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: Pyongyang calling: we spent a week in North Korea | Guardian Tokyo week: Looking for cheap rent? Try a haunted house

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: Better Together: Is communal living the answer to modern malaise? | Back from the dead: could AI end grief? | Inside Syria’s ‘horror city': Sednaya and a country reborn

programme.title: Meet the artists
programme.desc: Jane and Louise Wilson | Alex Katz

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: Guardian Tokyo week: Fewer wrestlers, more fans - Sumo at a crossroads | Guardian Tokyo week: Salariman rap battle

programme.title: Five minute masterminds
programme.desc: Leading experts of their field discuss their latest research and explain how it will impact us all

programme.title: The Pegasus project
programme.desc: A special investigation into NSO Group, which sells hacking spyware to governments.

programme.title: Second innings
programme.desc: From Afghanistan to London, three boys build a new life playing cricket. Tucked away in suburban south London, matches take place every week for young and often traumatised asylum seekers.

programme.title: America's soccer migrants: the US footballers crossing Mexico's border
programme.desc: Despite President Donald Trump’s rhetoric about Mexicans crossing the border to the US, American soccer players such as Omar Gonzalez are heading south for new opportunities, more money and a better standard of football.

programme.title: Why is Vladimir Putin so obsessed with Ukraine? | I count myself as a Black Ukrainian
programme.desc: Why is Vladimir Putin so obsessed with Ukraine? | I count myself as a Black Ukrainian: the fashion designer starting again in Budapest

programme.title: With Woman: the high stakes for a home-birth midwife in the US
programme.desc: Star is a Black midwife who helps Black women give birth in the comfort of their homes, in the state of Illinois. She is part of a long-established African-American tradition of home-birth midwifery.

programme.title: Garth Nix answers your questions: on JRR Tolkien, gaming and pronouncing characters' names
programme.desc: In an ongoing series, Guardian Australia is getting kids and young adults to do the hard work instead of us – by interviewing their favourite authors.

programme.title: I fled Ukraine with my son | Refugees in Calais
programme.desc: I fled Ukraine with my son. Now we're going back home | Refugees in Calais: ‘house them like the Ukrainians’

programme.title: Plants before pandas | Paradise lost: The town incinerated by California's deadliest wildfire
programme.desc: Plants before pandas: the young botanist tackling extinction in his own backyard | Paradise lost: the town incinerated by California's deadliest wildfire

programme.title: The Trial
programme.desc: Alka Pradhan, James Connell and Sterling Thomas are lawyers for Ammar al-Baluchi, one of five men facing the death penalty for plotting the 2001 terror attacks in the US.

programme.title: Police Brutality: the families left behind | What does it mean to defund the police?
programme.desc: The families left behind after police killings: 'You never get over losing a child' | What does it mean to defund the police?

programme.title: Untold Chaos: Living through Libya's wars
programme.desc: At the end of his US presidency, Barack Obama said his worst mistake was failing to plan for the day after the intervention in Libya.

programme.title: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation in underground music
programme.desc: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation: still the ultimate in underground music?

programme.title: Pretty radical: a young woman's journey into the heart of Poland's far right
programme.desc: We follow 19-year-old Paulina, who joins Poland’s far-right National Radical Camp.

programme.title: Old Lesbians
programme.desc: From first crush to first love, from the closet to coming out and from loss to connection. For the last 25 years, retired schoolteacher Arden Eversmeyer travelled from Houston across the US to record hundreds of oral 'herstories' from a rapidly disappearing population.

programme.title: Pressure and Release: horse therapy for young Indigenous Australians
programme.desc: The Kimberley region of Western Australia is a beautiful place. But it is home to communities in crisis – devastated by a pattern of suicides among young Aboriginal people.

programme.title: Our House
programme.desc: Brian was down on his luck and sleeping rough in Liverpool. Lawrence was a successful hotelier and property developer. David was a self-proclaimed hippy in a dead-end job. Together they formed an unlikely alliance and created a homeless shelter like no other. But can it last?

programme.title: Globalised slavery: how big supermarkets are selling prawns in supply chain fed by slave labour
programme.desc: A six-month Guardian multimedia investigation has, for the first time, tracked how some of the world's big-supermakets are using suppliers relying on slave labour to put cheap prawns on their shelves. Slavery is back and here's the proof. Narrated by Benedict Cumberbatch.

programme.title: After the riots | From naked protests to challenging Museveni
programme.desc: After the riots: the Muslim women filming everything to stay safe | From naked protests to challenging Museveni: Uganda’s 'rudest feminist' on the campaign trail

programme.title: The pioneering New York prison program transforming lives | Keeping Panini alive in the digital age
programme.desc: Writing wrongs: the pioneering New York prison program transforming lives | Meet the stickerheads: the people keeping Panini alive in the digital age

programme.title: Fish story
programme.desc: Sometime in the 1980s, Caspar Salmon's grandmother was invited to a gathering on the Welsh island of Anglesey, attended exclusively by people with fish surnames. Or so he says. Thirty years later, film-maker Charlie Lyne attempts to sort myth from reality.

programme.title: World Cup Slaves
programme.desc: Nepalese men employed in Qatar's construction industry tell Robert Booth how they work for little or no pay as they build the infrastructure ahead of the 2022 football World Cup.

programme.title: The only way out is through Jesus: The El Salvador pastors saving MS-13 gang members
programme.desc: In El Salvador, where brutal gangs like MS-13 and 18th Street have given the country the world’s highest murder rate, the only way out for members is to become born-again Christians.

programme.title: 2020: A Covid Space Odyssey
programme.desc: A short diary of astronaut Jessica Meir during her seven-month mission on the International Space Station (September 2019 - April 2020).

programme.title: Murder, corruption and cattle barons in Kenya | Finding Ashley
programme.desc: Murder, corruption and cattle barons in Kenya | Finding Ashley: a Native American family's desperate search for their missing relative

programme.title: From California gang to Mexican vigilante | The final interview with a legendary journalist
programme.desc: From California gang to Mexican vigilante: the family man fighting the drug cartels in Mexico | Murdered in Mexico: the final interview with a legendary journalist

programme.title: Four weddings
programme.desc: Not all weddings are about marrying a prince. This documentary tells the story of four special weddings around the world from the point of view of the bride.

programme.title: Gay, black and HIV positive: America's hidden epidemic
programme.desc: If you are a black, gay man in America, your risk of contracting HIV is one in two. Leah Green travels to Atlanta, Georgia, which has the largest gay and black community in the country. She finds out how stigma, education and structural racism continue to feed into this startling statistic

programme.title: This is the NHS
programme.desc: The doctors who save the sickest babies | Love and dementia: 'Grandad's like a naughty five-year-old'

programme.title: America's Dirty Divide
programme.desc: No water, no life: running out of water on the California-Oregon border | The 'gift of God' that has poisoned American kids for 100 years

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: The people against King Charles: how protesters are getting ready for the coronation | Are French protesters more effective? Meet the ‘next level’ climate activists

programme.title: Death land
programme.desc: Hello, I have death anxiety | he death doula: helping you prepare for the day you die

programme.title: Black Enough?
programme.desc: Anime has a race problem, here's how black fans are fixing it | Why horror keeps creeping into black drama

programme.title: The Green Recovery
programme.desc: Rebuilding post-pandemic Australia

programme.title: How to fix space's junk problem | Too black for Brazil
programme.desc: No TV, no sat nav, no internet: how to fix space's junk problem | Too black for Brazil

programme.title: The internet warriors
programme.desc: Who are the people that get so angry online? Meet the internet warriors, in their own homes.

programme.title: The island
programme.desc: Christmas Island, off the coast of Australia: here 50 million crabs make their slow and ancient migration from the jungle to the ocean's edge, while thousands of people seeking asylum are indefinitely held in a high security detention facility.

programme.title: Fight or flight: the veterans at war with PTSD
programme.desc: One hundred years on from the end of the first world war, a group of veterans in Dorset are torn between their pride in their military careers and their anger over the lack of psychological support provided to them by the Ministry of Defence.

programme.title: Ghosts of Moria: living in the ashes of Europe's largest migrant camp
programme.desc: As Europe’s most infamous migrant camp burned to the ground on the island of Lesbos in 2020, two Syrian friends evaded police to stay.

programme.title: Death at Sea | Inner-city cricket: The Midlands. Is ethnic minority talent being missed?
programme.desc: Death at sea: Syrian migrants film their perilous voyage to Europe | Inner-city cricket: The Midlands. Is ethnic minority talent being missed?

programme.title: The Mexican women who kicked out | Mumbai's all-female taxi firm | Veiled rapper breaking taboos
programme.desc: The Mexican women who kicked out the cartels | Drive for women's empowerment: Mumbai's all-female taxi firm | The veiled rapper breaking taboos for women in Senegal

programme.title: The Native American kids who get $200k for graduating
programme.desc: The Ho-Chunk Nation are a Native American tribe that owns a string of casinos across Wisconsin. Ho Chunk children get a share of casino profits once they’ve graduated and turned 18.

programme.title: The foreign domestic staff living a life of five-star | Isis has my kids
programme.desc: I was just a slave: the foreign domestic staff living a life of five-star serfdom in London | Isis has my kids: I won't stop till I get them home to the US

programme.title: I came out as HIV positive to break down stigma | Staged Sex: Role of the Intimacy Co-Ordinator
programme.desc: Lloyd Russell-Moyle tells Owen Jones: 'I came out as HIV positive to break down stigma' | Staged Sex: Role of the Intimacy Co-Ordinator

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Squizzy, kapitan kutra Bold Contender, wyrusza na morze w nadziei, że uda mu się zarobić na zwyżce cen homarów. Na wodach wokół południowej Tasmanii chce złowić 1900 homarów.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Tragedia w Szwecji — w ciągu kilku sekund wali się most. W kasynie w New Jersey dochodzi do ogromnej katastrofy budowlanej. Potężna awaria tamy niszczy miejscowość w Kalifornii.

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Najsilniejsze od 70 lat opady deszczu wywołują powodzie w Nowej Południowej Walii; w Queensland nurek Mackie ryzykuje życie w mętnej rzece Mary, aby umożliwić pracę ekipie z Clayton's Towing.

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Jedyna koparka ekipy staje w ogniu; brakująca część opóźnia wiercenie — Justin przylatuje z dwoma piłami linowymi i szybko traci zimną krew, próbując je ustawić.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S5 Ep7
programme.desc: Steve Grahame zabiera swojego nowego psa, Bellę, w długą drogę do Alice Springs. Zespół Nitro Funny Cars pędzi 3 tys. km przez Australię, aby zdążyć na jedno z największych dorocznych wydarzeń.

programme.title: Bohaterowie z St. John's
programme.desc: Operatorzy dźwigów wykorzystują szczyt sezonu połowów, aby zwodować ogromną liczbę łodzi; ta pora roku jest wyjątkowo trudna dla osób odpowiedzialnych za utrzymanie czystości szlaków żeglugowych.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Squizzy, kapitan kutra Bold Contender, wyrusza na morze w nadziei, że uda mu się zarobić na zwyżce cen homarów. Na wodach wokół południowej Tasmanii chce złowić 1900 homarów.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Squizzy, kapitan kutra Bold Contender, wyrusza na morze w nadziei, że uda mu się zarobić na zwyżce cen homarów. Na wodach wokół południowej Tasmanii chce złowić 1900 homarów.

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Wszystkim puszczają nerwy, kiedy ekipa Parks Towing podejmuje się wyciągnięcia ciężarówki z ładunkiem pod ciśnieniem z dna stromego wąwozu w zaśnieżonych górach na terenie Canterbury w Nowej Zelandii.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Rutynowa rozbiórka wiaduktu nad jedną z najbardziej ruchliwych amerykańskich autostrad w Ohio kończy się tragicznie. Zawalenie się tamy powoduje tsunami zniszczeń w południowej Kalifornii.

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Wczesne opady śniegu opóźniają wydobycie; załoga próbuje uruchomić piłę linową, aby wydobyć kawałek 18-metrowej soczewki skalnej. Claudia zastępuje chorego Gary'ego.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Mackay House Movers wykonują jedno ze swoich największych zleceń w historii firmy. Steve Grahame przeżywa koszmar w drodze przez równinę Nullarbor: ma problemy z wynajętym kierowcą i z własnym psem.

programme.title: Bohaterowie z St. John's
programme.desc: Spór o największe łowisko na świecie utknął w martwym punkcie; egzystencja wielu ludzi wisi na włosku.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Cena homarów stoi bardzo wysoko — powyżej 100 dolarów australijskich za kilogram — ale wszystkie załogi zmagają się z problemami. Załogi kutrów Kai Kuora i Ansons Bay chcą złowić po 1000 sztuk.

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Firma Wagga Truck Towing musi usunąć obciążony pociąg drogowy, który zablokował autostradę. Nowozelandzka firma Parks Towing wyciąga skradziony samochód ze stromego wąwozu w strefie trzęsienia ziemi.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Katastrofa w Kalifornii przecina na dwie części jedną z najważniejszych amerykańskich autostrad. W Teksasie wybucha rafineria, a brytyjscy naukowcy szukają zaginionej sondy kosmicznej.

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Claudia sięga po drogie wiertła i wiertarki, ale ma tylko cztery dni, aby znaleźć najlepszy nefryt. Nie może uzgodnić z Robinem, gdzie wiercić, podczas gdy Larry próbuje uruchomić stary buldożer.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S5 Ep9
programme.desc: Mark Cromwell i jego zespół podejmują się największej misji w historii. Niedawno zalane drogi sprawiają kłopoty Steve'owi Grahame'owi. Mick King przewozi 15-miesięczną żyrafę do nowego domu.

programme.title: Bohaterowie z St. John's
programme.desc: Wraz z rozpoczęciem długo wyczekiwanego sezonu na kraby setki łodzi wypływają w morze, a jeden z rybaków ma nadzieję ustanowić rekord świata.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Nowicjusz Steve Hursey dokonuje pierwszego zimowego połowu; w restauracji należącej do jego rodziny kończą się zapasy homarów, a Steve ma temu zaradzić.

programme.title: Największe pomyłki inżynierów
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Największe pomyłki inżynierów S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Katastrofa w Kalifornii przecina na dwie części jedną z najważniejszych amerykańskich autostrad. W Teksasie wybucha rafineria, a brytyjscy naukowcy szukają zaginionej sondy kosmicznej.

programme.title: Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Ekstremalna pomoc drogowa S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Firma Wagga Truck Towing musi usunąć obciążony pociąg drogowy, który zablokował autostradę. Nowozelandzka firma Parks Towing wyciąga skradziony samochód ze stromego wąwozu w strefie trzęsienia ziemi.

programme.title: Nefrytowa gorączka
programme.desc: Claudia sięga po drogie wiertła i wiertarki, ale ma tylko cztery dni, aby znaleźć najlepszy nefryt. Nie może uzgodnić z Robinem, gdzie wiercić, podczas gdy Larry próbuje uruchomić stary buldożer.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S5 Ep9
programme.desc: Mark Cromwell i jego zespół podejmują się największej misji w historii. Niedawno zalane drogi sprawiają kłopoty Steve'owi Grahame'owi. Mick King przewozi 15-miesięczną żyrafę do nowego domu.
